author: protolambda
content:
If you are interested in validating on a testnet, and need Goerli ETH, then you can get some from a bot in the Ethstaker or Prysm discords. *Please do not DM random people for goerli ETH*.
Ethstaker discord `#request-goerli-eth`: https://discord.gg/hVx65mE
Prysm discord `#request-goerli-eth`: https://discord.gg/V6Ud4n3
